name: Fil Rouge Capital
description: Fil Rouge Capital is the most active VC firm in Croatia. They invest through their incubation and acceleration program with the possibility of the follow on funding. Their typical check size ranges from 50k - 350k. They are generalist and rather agnostic looking mainly for disruption but our sweet spots are: SaaS, cloud services, marketplace, e-commerce, AI, deep tech, Fintech, Logistics, IOT, industry 4.0, 5G applications, B2B, B2C, etc.
investmentAreas: SaaS, Cloud Services, Marketplaces, E-Commerce, AI, Deep Tech, Fintech, Logistics, IoT, Industry 4.0, 5G, B2B, B2C

name: Feelsgood
description: Feelsgood Social Impact Investment Fund is designed to invest in Croatian and Slovenian ventures that have typical private equity/venture capital for-profit-aims like commercial business models, led by strong management teams and ready to scale, but in addition can and will deliver measurable social impact. Feelsgood is spotting and supporting businesses that can find a way to address, if they already have not, one or more of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals and make measurable impact a conscious sustainable strategy of their business models.
investmentAreas: Impact Investing, Clean Tech, BioTech, Sustainability, Food

name: SQ Capital
description: SQ Capital invests its own funds into each fund they manage or investment they select, ensuring alignment of motives with their investors. They uphold the principle that while times and circumstances may change, core values should remain constant. The team's diverse interests and backgrounds enrich their collective intellectual curiosity, which brought them together initially. Transparency is a key tenet for SQ Capital; they believe that honesty is essential for sustaining long-term relationships, and they provide an accurate picture regardless of the situation. Humbled by the markets many times, they strive to stay grounded, continuously learning and improving. Adopting a long-term approach, they recognize that short-term volatility and results can be misleading, but sound investments will ultimately yield the desired success.

name: Invento
description: Invento is a venture capital innovation fund that specializes in fostering innovation and working directly with local entrepreneurs. INVENTO act as a business accelerator for start-ups and SMEs, collaborates on business initiatives, and improves regional access to risk capital. With extensive experience in building innovation ecosystems throughout years of operation INVENTO team became recognized as a group of experienced professionals that closely work with industry, tech-based companies, and business support organizations as well as regional and local authorities.
investmentAreas: Cyber Security, E-Commerce, Information, Communications Technology (ICT)
